about_the_game:
Every truck needs a reliable trailer and that is exactly what the Kögel Trailer Pack brings to the world of Euro Truck Simulator 2! Kögel Trailer, based in Burtenbach, has a long history in the transportation industry being established back in 1934. Renowned for its innovative designs and commitment to quality, Kögel manufactures a diverse range of trailers tailored to meet the evolving needs of logistics professionals worldwide. With six new Kögel trailers, five cabin accessories, wheel hubs, and nut covers, you will never miss the deadline to deliver your cargo!

This DLC includes these trailers:

• Kögel Cargo
• Kögel Cool
• Kögel Tipper
• Kögel Tankplex
• Kögel Triplex
• Kögel Duplex

Don’t forget to decorate your cabin with some beautiful accessories! In this DLC, you will find these Kögel-themed decorations:

• Kögel thermos
• Kögel mug
• Kögel work gloves
• Kögel cap
• Kögel minitruck

This DLC also includes special wheel hubs and bolt covers:

• Kögel Wheel Hubs
• Kögel Nut Covers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM)
  • Hard Drive: 25 GB available space (Euro Truck Simulator 2 base game)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or similar
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 590 (2GB VRAM)
  • Hard Drive: 25 GB available space (Euro Truck Simulator 2 base game)

With 6 new Kögel trailers, 5 cabin accessories, wheel hubs, and nut covers, you'll never miss the deadline to deliver your cargo!
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Hungarian, Czech, Romanian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Greek, Ukrainian, Traditional Chinese
